all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And that you be firm in keeping the commandments wherewith I have commanded you; and if you do this, behold I grant unto you eternal life, even if you should be slain.
Doctrine and Covenants 5:22
Quote of the Day
"Time and again, with His pure love and mercy, [the Savior] sustains us as we face the drama of life."
Ronald A. Rasband | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
